front.title: PPP EAP MAKE Mutual Authentication Protocol

abstract.t: This memo describes EAP-MAKE protocol, an authentication protocol based on EAP which emphasizes on simplicity and scalability. Authentication is provided through a mechanism derived from the Diffie-Hellman scheme, and it is possible to derive and check a common symmetric key for the purpose of privacy. Scalability is provided by the underlying support of legacy PKI systems.
